course_title: Pediatric Acute Care Nurse Practitioner I
class_notes: Students must register for practicum course NRSG 616 Pediatric Acute Care NP Practicum I
course_description: In this course, students begin care of the acutely ill or injured child. Emphasis is on the recognition, management, stabilization and restoration of health post-emergency health crisis for children with a variety of acute clinical disorders.
prerequisites: NRSG 547 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 4107, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: A. Brown, Status: Open
